name: aperture-science
author: [cyan]Gdeft
description: [white]Greetings, everyone! This is Cave Johnson speaking,  [accent]ever wanted to experience what it's like to be test subjects in our place?[] Well, now you can (probably)! We are here bringing you closer to experience the world of Aperture Science in Mindustry. Though it's still in development, you can contribute by leaving suggestions or help in our Discord server, we would appreciate your contribution for this project. Alright then, end of recording.
